name: The Blessing of Chaahk
description:
You play as the Mayan god Chaahk, who wields the power to bless the world with rain. Use your power to let all plants grow to full size before the sun is setting!

But beware:

Water the plants too much and their growth will be hindered! The same is true if their supply of water is too short! What's more: Plants need the light of the sun as much as they need the gift of rain. Be careful where you cast your shadow!

Your size determines the amount of rain your blessing provides as well as the shadow you cast and how quick you can move around. Only through clever navigation and the use of both available cloud shapes you may be successful.

May you grant the world your blessing.

Controls ActionKeys Move LeftArrow Key Left | A Move RightArrow Key Right | D Switch size of cloudArrow Key Up | W Make it rainArrow Key Down | S | SPACE Back to Title | QuitESC Dev's note

This game is Hannes Thalheim's and Marcel Winter's submission for MashUp Game Jam in June 2020.

Jam's Theme: Size Matters!
